name: power-swap
effect: User swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat modifiers modifiers with the target.
short_effect: User swaps Attack and Special Attack changes with the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.
